definitions.definition: The smaller spore of a heterosporous plant, typically producing a male gametophyte .
One of the numerous tiny spore-like elements produced through the encystment and subdivision of many monads .

main_definition: ( botany ) The smaller spore of a heterosporous plant, typically producing a male gametophyte .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) One of the numerous tiny spore-like elements produced through the encystment and subdivision of many monads .
